body.name: Soft Flask 3 Pack - 5 oz (150 ml), 8.5oz (250ml), & 13.5oz (400ml) - Shrink As You Drink Soft Water Bottle for Hydration Pack - Folding Water Bottle For Running & Hiking - Running Water Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: 3 COMBO PACK OF SOFT FLASKS: FITLY's triple pack of soft flasks includes three sizes - a small 5oz/150ml, a medium 8.5oz/250ml and a larger model of 13.5oz/400ml. Our collapsible water bottle is a compact and eco-friendly way to stay hydrated on the move! The soft water bottle is the perfect hydration tool for active individuals. Our soft flasks shrink as you drink, taking up minimal space and won’t slosh around, making it perfect for runners and vigorous activities.

SHRINKS AS YOU DRINK: Our collapsible water bottle is uniquely designed to shrink as you drink. This ensures the water doesn’t slosh around, bounce or rattle. The flexible design shapes to your hand & body, meaning the soft flask is never unwieldy. Our flexible water bottle features an intelligent bite valve & leak-resistant mouthpiece.

STAY LIGHT ON YOUR FEET: FITLY’s collapsible flask is purposely lightweight ensuring your light on your feet and not weighted down by unnecessary bulk. At FITLY, reusability is deeply important to us, and our water bladder is no exception. Enjoy limitless use from our collapsible water bottle that is 100% BPA & PVC-free.

HYDRATION ON THE MOVE: Our soft flask is specially crafted for vigorous activities such as running, hiking, cycling and climbing. The perfect sporting companion, take it everywhere with you! Our soft water bottle can be folded and tucked into your pocket or bag. Our soft flask comes in 5 size variations and are freezable so they can double as an ice pack.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: We recommend rinsing the flask thoroughly before first use. If you experience taste mix ½ a teaspoon of BAKING SODA with water, shake and rinse. Users have also found the following to be useful: Fill with MILK, shake, and rinse. Add drops of lemon. Let an orange peel or tea bag set in the flask for a couple of hours. To hydrate, simply softly bite the mouthpiece and press the soft flask and enjoy! The harder you press, the faster the liquid will exit.
body.description: Made to be used when you move Softly bite the mouthpiece.Press the flask.Suck on the goodness! The more you press, the faster the liquid will exit. The walls collapse as you drink, letting you absorb almost 100% of its content. Super useful for runners and vigorous activities. No liquid bounce Soft bite to quick flow Leak resistant and rigid cap ring for easy refill Durable, built to last No detectable plastic odor or taste

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FITLY FLASKS are small collapsible soft flasks part of FITLY's product range of premium running accessories, first launched on Kickstarter.

FITLY Soft Flasks Ideal for quick drinks on the run. Gobble up a gel, wet a dry throat, or re-hydrate. Designed to be used while running. Store directly in your front, side, or back pockets. The flasks shrink as you drink so nothing ever moves, bounces or rattles. 5 models to choose from: FLASK150 (5oz): small enough to fit in small pockets for quick access.FLASK250 (8.5oz): a compromise between size and volume.FLASK350 (12oz): same width as the FLASK250 but a little longer.FLASK400 (13.5oz): go a little farther. Take a little more.FLASK500 (17oz): used as a stand-alone soft flask or with tubing (included). Note that FLASK500 comes with FITLY Sub90 and is too big for FITLY Sub45. IMPORTANT: Soft Flasks are NOT MADE for viscous substances like a gel (typically self-serving anyways) but flowing liquids. Many runners use a mixture of water and gel. Not as thick and transits better through the mouthpiece. The flasks are all sealed by hands. Expect volume variations up to 1 oz (up or down).

FLASK500 All the fun stuffs and some tips: Keep it cool longer. Leave it in the fridge or the freezer.Mix a gel with water to add some energy or squeeze a lemon for taste.Top rack dish-washer compatible.Wash it thoroughly prior to first use. <5% of people experience a taste. Rinse with baking soda until it disappears. Made to be used when you move Softly bite the mouthpiece.Press the flask.Suck on the goodness! The more you press, the faster the liquid will exit. The walls collapse as you drink, letting you absorb almost 100% of its content. Super useful for runners and vigorous activities. No liquid bounce Soft bite to quick flow Leak resistant and rigid cap ring for easy refill Durable, built to last No detectable plastic odor or taste

Compatible with FITLY Innovative Running Packs, hydration vests, running belts and back packs. Clever bite valve Durable and leak resistant mouthpiece. Make sure to twist the mouthpiece shut so it does not leak! Add natural oil to the thread to increase the seal if need be. Fits in front, side or back pockets A variety of flask sizes made for a wider range of activities. From 5 to 17 oz. Surprisingly easy to use! Thoroughly tested and re-tested. The mouthpiece has a hard and soft part, gently bite the soft part and liquid will gush out. FLASK500 + tube 17oz soft flask + 2 mouthpieces: 1 to use the flask as a stand-alone1 with a 45 deg rotating mouthpiece and a 23 inch tubing system

FLASK150 FLASK250 FLASK350 FLASK400 FLASK500 Size in In 5.5 x 2.75 7.5 x 3.5 8.75 x 3.5 8 x 4 8.5 x 6 Volume 5oz - 150ml 8.5oz - 250ml 12oz - 350ml 13.5oz - 400ml 17oz - 500ml SRP 10 USD 13 USD 14 USD 15 USD 25 USD

Statements from actual users: "My mouth gets super dry quickly and must always carry water with me. I didn't want to carry a big, clumsy water bottle". "Everything about this flask is awesome from the soft yet grippy texture to the bite nipple". "Works like a charm". "Overall product is exactly as advertised". "The flask is the perfect size during runs". "It's durable, high-quality material, and cleans well. Would highly recommend!". "Amazing product, just bought the second one" "The bite valve works great". "No detectable plastic odor". See Product Reviews for complete statements. . The important footnotes: Since the Flasks must seal properly to function, make sure to TWIST it shut. Apply natural oil to the threads to increase the seal. All prices are for 1 (one) flask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits in my pocket and doesn't splash around!
reviews.reviewText: I like having three sizes to choose from. I like the materials it is made with, and the tops don't leak! It fit comfortably in my pocket so I didn't have to carry it in my hand. I like this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for pockets when skiing
reviews.reviewText: these collapsable water bottles are perfect for the ski slopes. My kids always take one to Nordic ski practice. They are lightweight and easy to use when wearing gloves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight & easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I am unable to use traditional water bottles when biking. So far these are easy to use, fit nicely in my jersey pockets, and clean easily. The plastic taste went away as soon as I washed them (common issue, baking soda can also help remove it)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product but slight rubber taste
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to take on my walks on hot days. The smaller ones go nicely in my pocket and hold enough water to give me what I need for a 60 minute walk. After using the for about ten times each - they still give the water a slight plastic/rubber taste but it meets my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Compact Flasks
reviews.reviewText: Like the different sizes for trail running and plan to use for Swim/Run events

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Buyer beware. I had previously purchased two Fitly flasks and love them! This set I received smell strongly like incense. I had already thrown away the package before I realized it wasn’t coming out, so return is not an option. I tried baking soda, charcoal, coffee grounds, and bleach. The odor just keeps coming back. They are completely unusable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No bad taste
reviews.reviewText: These are great for snowboarding.They never leak in your pocket.

They got the job done, though they made the water taste very strongly of rubber after multiple washes with soap. The top part is a good design to prevent spilling, but horrible for trying to drink from it. It’s better to just unscrew the top altogether unless you want water everywhere.
